name: More Tom Swifties Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct American English, although the pronunciation may not be.

QUESTION ONE:"Have you ever been whitewater rafting?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Rapidly.

	There are usually rapids in waterways used in whitewater rafting.

questions.text: "I love a ___ at the baseball game," said Tom with relish.
questions.explanation:
Hot Dog.

	Many people like relish on hot dogs.

questions.text: "I can't eat any more lemon peel," said Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Zestfully.

	Another name for lemon peel is zest and if you can't eat any more you are full.

questions.text: "I can do an excellent impression of ___," said Tom, being perfectly frank.

questions.explanation:
Muttered.

	A German mother is a mutter.

questions.text: "I'm just going to put these handcuffs on you," screamed Tom ___.
"I've run out of wool," said Tom, ___ his brow.
questions.explanation:
Knitting.

	Self explanatory, I believe, but you usually knit with wool.

Guessed.

	If someone is your host, you're their guest.

questions.text: "Don't let me drown in ___!" pleaded Tom, deep in denial.
questions.explanation:
Egypt.

	The Nile is in Egypt.

questions.text: "I'm wearing my wedding ring," said Tom with ___.
questions.explanation:
Abandon.

	If you're wearing your wedding ring, you have a band on.
